Mental Health Assistance

span.style: text-align: left; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; word-spacing: 0px; white-space: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

span.span: If any child is in need of mental wellness support/counseling please call the District's main line at 386-329-0538 and they will be put in touch with a counselor.

span.em: *This information applies only to traditional public schools. Charter schools are responsible for creating their own distance learning plans and will communicate details directly with their students' families.
